title: Erky Perky
overview:
Erky and Perky, two buggy bugs, are living the sweet life in a downtown 
Hot Dog Stand. Crumbs, garbage, hot and cold running mold . . . it's 
paradise. Until they are swept away in a take-out bag, that is. The two 
bickering bugs are forced to survive in this strange new land, spending 
their days on a quest to find the legendary Refrigerator and looking for
 a one-way ticket back home!
